website_summaries.verdict: While you'll pay a premium for its extra features, the Slingbox 500 is an excellent way to watch your TV or DVR video content anywhere.
pros: The Slingbox 500 streams video from your TV or DVR (or any analog source) to your PC, tablet, smartphone, and some streaming boxes at resolutions up to full 1080p HD
IR blasters are built into the box’s body, eliminating the need for annoying extra external wires
There are no monthly charges or fees
Unlike the step-down Slingbox 350 model, this one adds Wi-Fi and HDMI support, as well as the ability to stream photos and videos from Android phones and iPhones
cons: At close to $300, it's fairly expensive
Smartphone- and tablet-viewing apps cost extra
It duplicates some of the features found on TV anywhere apps you may already be using
As always, streaming capabilities are only as good as your home bandwidth

Sling's solution per manual is to hook up the analog inputs (component) as well but the Spectrum 210 cable box only has HDMI out. That would normally be the end of the story however I found that certain HDMI splitters resolve that issue. It now works great.

customer_reviews.text: It works amazing !!! Anywhere I go, now I can watch any channel and program from my satellite receiver from my home. Just plug the cables from the output of ypur receiver to the Slingbox and then the ethernet cable also to it. Finally, just download the App for your iPod, iPad, etc. and you are done. No more sadness for NOT being near a TV to watch your favorite foot ball game. Whatever is playing on your channels in your receiver you can see and you can even change the channels remotely. NICE !!!
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with the Slingbox 500
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 3rd slingbox unit that I've owned. The previous one I purchased was the HD Pro and that work fine for me with one exception, no wifi. With this unit, I connect via wifi to my upstairs router and off I go. It also appears that the datastream is more compressed somewhat than the previous versions (you can monitor bandwidth usage while connecting with the web client) and the caching seems to work better as well. Only downside I've noticed is that you can no longer use the old Slingplayer app. Other than that, all good in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tolson

customer_reviews.title: WOW . It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading a lot about this product and weighed the pros and cons and decided this was the best unit for my needs. It did take longer to set up than I would have liked, but the instructions were very clear and I had no problems. I have already used this in my home and have a tripped planned in a couple of weeks and will really put it to the test then.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product for frequent travelers. Watching tv in your own language is a neglected value in long business trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Perez

customer_reviews.title: I could not get it to work as advertised. ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work as advertised. I could see video on my iphone or laptop but no sound. Tech support could not figure it out either. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it should, and does it very well. Streams are high quality on every device I;ve used it with so far: Android (SG3) phone, iPhone (4S and 5C), iPad, Android tablet, HDTV via Roku and Android or iPhone. Would give a 5th star if I didn;t have to use a smartphone to get it to play on the TV, should be able to play directly from a SmartTV or Roku app.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it but internet connection can slow performance. Good performance over 3G, great performance with 4G to receive signal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hagist

customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to new box works great NO COMMERCIALS don't know why any complaints I subscribed years ago and works like old box VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: my media feature is no longer supported
customer_reviews.text: I have a Slingbox 500, which no longer has my media enabled. Slingbox removed my media feature back in August to September of 2014. I bought Slingbix 500 over 350, because it has my media feature. I hope Slingbox will enable my media feature back to Slingbox 500 in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Runnerfromla

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectations. It was almost like sitting in front of a live TV. I expected pixalation and network clipping or stalls for buffering. Not so. Of course I'm out in a rural area so network traffic is not so bad. Based on my experience, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! We use it while we are traveling and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We use it while we are traveling and always get the home news and don't have to miss our favorite shows.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaKGW

customer_reviews.title: Time shifting
customer_reviews.text: We install this in a friends home on the East Coast. Being able to watch TV shows earlier in the Evening simply is a huge plus. In addition we are Dolphins fans and with the great seasons they have had lately. Not on National TV much anymore. So being able to Sling the games on Sunday has been a plus. Setup was smooth and finished within 20-30 min. Remember it makes a big difference that the source has fast upload speed. Fast to me is anything above 2 Mbps.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: When you read the reviews and ones that are negative just realize these persons do not have a good enough internet signal. I am so impressed with this Sling Box. It is saving me $51.00 a month. I no longer have to pay for an additional subscription for satellite TV but can use the Sling Box with the Boxee Box at my other home.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hlebo

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the fuss is about set up
customer_reviews.text: I am a Comcast customer, and I set the Slingbox up to take the signal from my cable box. It could not have been simpler. Make sure you use both component and HDMI cables provided. I was put off by some of the comments about set up. So far I have had ZERO issues. Only complaint is after the price of the box, you then need to pay for the app(s). So far I am able to watch my favorite sports teams without having to pay the various leagues. That is worth the price for me. A nice plus is the DVR is available as well. Only hitch is timing your fast forwarding or reverse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The product freezes up all the time. Then we have to back all the way out and e do it, missing a lot of great parts of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: sling box 500
customer_reviews.text: it is really sad that the company decided to stop production this work like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Guy L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. A must have if you travel a lot and want to see your home channels
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Works about half the time.
customer_reviews.text: When it does work, it's fine. Will stop suddenly at random and be unable to reconnect even though no internet problems exist on either side. I wrote the review above about a year ago (I think) and gave it one star after using Slingbox for some time. Since then it has worked better so I upped the grade. Now I would say it works 80% of the time. Much better
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: OK but design is too restrictive.
customer_reviews.text: I like what the Sling Box does, but hate the awkward design of it.
customer_reviews.author: Parl Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: check compatibility
customer_reviews.text: not currently compatible with Roku/Sling.TV - which is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: P. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Good box but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Others have written how the hdmi functionality is kind of bogus. So what the component cables give a near equivalent picture too. Yes it's a little pricey but the old unit did not have a remote control to set up the device. You had to use the internet which was stupid. Another thing is that this unit detected and connected with my network but other two older units never could despite valiant attempts by support.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Adds that cannot be deleted!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently sling box was wonderful!! Now it is nothing but a bunch of adds, one after another. Most you cannot delete!!! We tried customer support and they deleted my comments. There was no way one could complain about the change!! Until the adds are changed, I would not buy another sling box and would ask for my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Must used composite to be functional
customer_reviews.text: that's not slings fault though. HDMI signal from HBO is encrypted for a reason and that is not slings fault although they don't market it that way. You don't find that helpful little fact out until you open the box
customer_reviews.author: LTC WLOO, IL

customer_reviews.title: Product great, Initial set up difficult
customer_reviews.text: Set up was much more difficult than I imagined, but I contacted the company and a lovely woman walked me through it ( the written instructions are woefully inadequate for Direct TV) The product works wonderfully, it6 was promptly delivered ,and once I got it hooked up, I was very pleased
customer_reviews.author: D., G. Menchetti

customer_reviews.title: Tv good
customer_reviews.text: Was awesome when I used it. Stream TV tell anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sling Box
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before I purchased a Slingbox and now I wonder why. The unit was easy to install (took me about 15 minutes) and it works great. Able to get great reception via wi-fi or LTE off my iPad and laptop. My unit is actually attached to a Tivo / iMac that I have on my work desk. I use the composite cables and it provides great video and no blocked video. Highly recommend........
customer_reviews.author: M. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I think its great for college kid and oyung adults who move to their first place. You can put this box in your parents place and stream it to your new place as long as you have internet. With some ISP's offering 30 a month internet this avoids the monthly 250 cost of a standard cable bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Cox Communications subscribers beware!
customer_reviews.text: Check your cable box before considering the Slingbox 500. Slingbox software does not support Cisco 8742HDC box, as of this writing.
customer_reviews.author: Cardy1998

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and even at work
customer_reviews.text: I love my ability to watch my TV from anywhere. Coming into March Madness I will be able to watch the Cyclones no matter where I am or what I am doing. I have paired with a Roku to watch programs at a rental house which worked well although the picture was not great. My only complaint is the overblown cost of the Slingbox App, plus the fact you are forced to purchase it separately for your phone and tablet. At least watching on a computer is free.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in many remote locations and as long as I had a decent internet signal, I was able to control my cable box and watch either live tv or items on my dvr without issue. The quality was crystal clear. Only downside is that the app is not cheap. That's the only reason it gets four instead of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aceface

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to connect to provider.
customer_reviews.text: Besides waiting for 20 minutes for help it took one hour to connect. We are not warned that sling box connects to different carriers with varying degrees of complexity. I will probably never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jms13

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to cable outlet
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new town home and wanted cable installed in our kitchen for my spouse, but when the technician arrived he indicated that he would have to tear up a lot of walls and cabinets to make that happen. I researched this technology and thought it would be a good alternative. Long story, short.....it works great. Reception in HD played on an iPad Mini is remarkable and my wife is able to move it around with ease. I have tried it in my office at work with the same results. Easy set up and it delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.author: William D Jarr

customer_reviews.title: Could have better support service
customer_reviews.text: Works okay in my overseas environment connecting to cable back in the U.S. I use a Sony Internet Player with Slingplayer and have expremely poor performance in the video quality. Called customer service to tried my account on all of the other devices except for the Sony player because they don't actually have one in their lab. Really, you recommend it but don't have one to test in your lab??? Overal, it is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

product_meta.title: Slingbox 500
product_meta.description: Turn your new high-resolution tablet or smartphone into a TV. The elegant Slingbox 500 delivers stunning picture quality, full HD at 1080p. New, simplified on-screen setup, HDMI and Wi-Fi network connectivity makes it easy to get started.
feature_bullets: Watch and control 100% of your live TV on a tablet*, phone*, PC, or Mac. *Requires Slingplayer for mobile devices app, sold separately.
Windows or MAC minimum requirements : Intel Core 2 Duo or better, DirectX 9 Class video card with more than 256 MB of dedicated memory for Windows PC
Home TV interface via HDMI with live sports and Gallery View for easy program discovery.
Sort by program genre or set up favorites, Integrated YouTube app and YouTube Web Gallery with top-trending videos.
Get contextual YouTube recommendations, based on the show you’re watching, at the touch of a button.
